p: In Taipei, two phylogenetic studies were conducted in consecutive periods in the HIV‐positive population. In 1994 to 2010, a retrospective cohort with no participants reporting a history of injection drug use revealed three pairs and four clusters inside subtypes 1b, 2a and 3a among 17 MSM and 1 heterosexual seroconverters, indicating a restricted network within HIV‐positive MSM [ 25]. In 2010 to 2016, another study reported the existence of two clusters of subtype 1b consisting of 14 HIV‐positive MSM and four suspected PWID [ 20]. An MSM‐specific cluster of subtype 6a was also recorded [ 20].
